messages.message: Hi everyone! We are looking for examples of customer use cases where we've done integrations / interfaces with very old systems or mainframes??? The government agency we are meeting with has over 60 systems they like to call "vintage" and "antiquated." Any customer examples we may have with mainframes, Oracle DB, and custom built systems would be ideal if you can point me to information or ping me directly! Much appreciated for this executive we're briefing!
